turns.content: Who is the coach of the Adelaide Crows, and how long has been in the position?
I do not have access to real-time information, but as of the last recorded data, matthew nicks was the coach of the adelaide crows, and he took over the position in october 2019.
Ah, got it. Do you know how the team is doing under his coaching?

I do not have access to real-time information, but based on the last recorded data, matthew nicks' coaching during his first season (2020) with the adelaide crows was challenging due to the team's rebuilding phase after a significant player exodus. however, there were some promising performances, and the team showed signs of improvement towards the end of the season.
That's good to know. I hope they continue to improve under his coaching this season. How's their roster looking now after the player exodus?

I do not have access to real-time information, but based on the last recorded data, the adelaide crows have been working to rebuild their roster after the player exodus. they have invested in young talent, including several high draft picks, and have also targeted experienced players from other clubs to help fill the void. the team has also implemented a new game plan under matthew nicks, which emphasizes a more attacking style of play. it remains to be seen how successful these changes will be, but there are certainly reasons for optimism among crows fans.
